resources.string: Get started
Create a deck, download a pre-made deck or add a note
Click on a deck to start studying
Long press on a deck to get more options related to it
Open study options to see card review details for a deck
See the answer
When you are ready to view the answer, click here
Select a coloured flag for this card
Undo and go back to the previous card
Select the difficulty
This will decide the time when this card will be displayed again
Enter card contents here
Enter the question in \'Front\' field and the answer in \'Back\' field
Format content
Format your card\'s content using various formatting options
Select a deck from here
Cards from the selected deck will be displayed. Choose \'All Decks\' to view all cards.
Select a card to edit it\nLong press to select multiple cards
AnkiDroid is a spaced repetition flashcard app. Memorize anything with AnkiDroid!
Create powerful decks with customised cards
Choose from multiple card types
Create cards which support multiple content formats
Text - Images - Sounds - MathJax - LaTeX
Study time
Review cards and select their difficulty according to which the time interval for their next appearance will be decided
Explore the list of your cards

Meaning of Commute
